Package ru.nubowski.timeTracker.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
ru.nubowski.timeTracker.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/users") public class UserController extends Object
Controller for handling user-related endpoints.

      Returns the user with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the user with the given username.

      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      HTTP status 503.

    • deleteUserAndTasks

      @DeleteMapping("/{username}/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUserAndTasks(@PathVariable String username)
      Deletes the user and their tasks with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user and their tasks to be deleted.
      Returns:
      a response entity with HTTP status 204.

    • resetTimeLogsAndTasks

      @DeleteMapping("/{username}/reset") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> resetTimeLogsAndTasks(@PathVariable String username)
      Deletes all the tasks and time logs of the user with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user whose tasks and time logs are to be reset.
      Returns:
      the user after the reset.

    • getTimeLogsByUserAndDateRange

      @GetMapping("/{username}/time_logs/date_range") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> getTimeLogsByUserAndDateRange(@PathVariable String username, @RequestParam("start") @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime start, @RequestParam("end") @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime end, @RequestParam(value="sort",required=false,defaultValue="duration") String sort, @RequestParam(value="output",required=false,defaultValue="duration") String output)
      Returns the time logs of the user within the given date range.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user.
      start - the start date of the range.
      end - the end date of the range.
      sort - the sort order of the time logs.
      output - the output format of the time logs.
      Returns:
      a list of time logs of the user within the given date range.

    • getTotalWorkEffortByUserAndDateRange

      @GetMapping("{username}/work_effort") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getTotalWorkEffortByUserAndDateRange(@PathVariable String username, @RequestParam("start") @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime start, @RequestParam("end") @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime end)
      Returns the total work effort of the user within the given date range.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user.
      start - the start date of the range.
      end - the end date of the range.
      Returns:
      the total work effort of the user within the given date range.
